description: The Liberty Apple (Malus 'Liberty') is an amazing species of apple that is renowned for its sweet and distinct taste. This apple is a widely grown throughout the US and was developed in 1982 for organic apple producers. It offers excellent disease resistance, great flavor and aroma, and is widely considered a top choice for cider production. Liberty Apples have a pleasing sweet taste, an excellent storage capability, and a high yield rate making them loved by orchardists and consumers alike. It ripens early in the season and makes an excellent choice for your home orchard.
